item.title: PK System
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Bill_, post:10, topic:391882”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=489048.msg3575373#msg3575373 date=1303380492]

hmmmm… i didnt leech any code… i know how to code… a 317 delta,but i dont know how to code a PI base that well. just the basics really. This is a learning process to me.

Yeah right. And you only started Friday?

Could you make a castle wars base that’s 100% working?

Could you?

no.
[/quote]

Yes, I was the original person who bought their castle wars base to this community, but it got withdrawn as it was giving me rep when I was banned, so shut your face and jog on.[/quote]
You added a 100% castle wars base? No glitches, full sound effect and graphics?
Doubt it, also if you have that much of an ego I suggest you don’t post. Because it’s just going too cause you shit in the long run. so stop being so cocky about things.

Read full topic

item.title: PK System
item.dc:creator: @Bill1 Bill_
item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

“I’m trying to make my client a PK server”

Ok there are a few things wrong here. This is the way RSPS roughly works.

A server is hosted on a computer and the person who wants to connect to the server uses a client. They exchange packets via the internet, and the packets determine how the character ( and sometimes the client) operate.

Tbh you seem like a less advanced coder. Go read through cheezscape 80. It’s the easiest thing to pick the basics up from.

Read full topic
